comments: Very laid back and very nice. I hadn\'t been in school for thirty years but I made an A in his class. You just have to listen and do what he tells you with MLA style and you will be fine.

Good teacher, laid back though it was pretty pointless to come to class. One day all we did was listen to music and do whatever. As long as you do the MLA format right it\'s an easy A. He doesn\'t really grade on content. Overall he is pretty good and I\'d recommend if you want an easy A and can listen to directions.

I took this as an online class. I did struggle to understand expectations and found some of the online material to be confusing. He is very quick to help clarify questions though. You have to read the syllabus because he gets irritated when students ask stupid questions they already had answers to. Format is EXTREMELY important!
This instructor has a laid back disposition but is very critical of homework submitted. I found his style to be quite intriguing and definitely came away with more than I previously knew.

I have this teacher for english 111 online and he is not helful at all! I e-mailed him the week before a paper was due and it took him 5 days to respond. This was after i sent 3 or 4 e-mails. I e-mailed some of the students in my class and they hadn\'t gotten responses either. He doesnt explain assignments well, and grades mostly on format.
Very unorganized for online classes.....doesn\'t explain things clearly.....the work load isn\'t a lot, however, he is not proficient in explaining how to do it without several mistakes on his part.
